title: electronic EHIC/entitlement document
description: Data Type for the electronic EHIC/entitlement document

hn.title: Name and given names
hn.description: Surname(s), forename(s) of the EHIC holder both in generic charset and in machine readable travel documents standard

dob.title: Date of birth
dob.description: Date of Birth of the holder

hi.title: Personal Identification number
hi.description: The personal identification number detail used by the issuing Member State. (In case such number does not exist, the identification number of the person from whom the rights derive shall be used)

ii.title: Identification number of the institution
ii.description: Identification code awarded nationally to the 'institution', viz. the competent institution of insurance

in.title: Name of the institution
in.description: The acronym of the institution is provided instead of the full name

ci.title: Card Identification number
ci.description: Logical identification number of the card

ic.title: Card Issuer Country
ic.description: Identification code of the country having issued the EHIC

sd.title: Entitlement Start date
sd.description: Start date of the entitlement to receive health care during a temporary stay in a Member State other than the insuring Member State

ed.title: Expiry date
ed.description: End date of the validity of the card

id.title: Date of issuance
id.description: Date when the document was issued

allOf.description: Contraint that the combined length of the 'Identification number of institution' and the 'Name of the institution' fields must not exceed 25 characters

person_name.description: Person name: The person's name consisting of a separate surname and a forename

fn.title: Surname
fn.description: The surname or primary name(s) of the person addressed in the EHIC

gn.title: Forename
gn.description: The forename(s) of the person addressed in the EHIC

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: Identification code of the country (2 digit ISO country code (ISO 3166-1)), with the addition of UK for GB
